# Background Position

| Class                   | Support     |
| ----------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
bg-bottom
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-center
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-left
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-left-bottom
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-left-top
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-right
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-right-bottom
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-right-top
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-top
```          | 🌐 Web only |
